name: Way of the Four Elements
description: Monks who bend the elements to their will through ki-fueled disciplines.

3.name: Disciple of the Elements
3.description: You learn magical disciplines that manipulate the elements, spending ki points to cast elemental spells and effects.

3.name: Elemental Disciplines
3.description: Know Elemental Attunement and one other elemental discipline of your choice, gaining more at higher levels.

6.name: Extra Elemental Discipline (6th)
6.description: Learn one additional elemental discipline, and you may replace one you know when you gain a new one.

11.name: Extra Elemental Discipline (11th)
11.description: Learn another elemental discipline, with the option to replace one you know.

17.name: Extra Elemental Discipline (17th)
17.description: Learn a final elemental discipline, and you may replace one you know.
